AboutSection.title: About the Motqen Association
AboutSection.about: The Motqen Association is dedicated to specialized Quranic programs focusing on the mastery of Quran memorization and teaching, using the correct specialized methods and modern educational tools to maximize impact and broaden the reach of beneficiaries.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Leadership in mastering Quran memorization and recitation with the latest tools and techniques.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Improving, organizing, and utilizing human and technical resources in the field of mastering Quran memorization and recitation.

goal1.title: Qualification
goal1.description: Graduates to learn the Qur'an in memorization circles and lead the prayers.

goal2.title: Preparation
goal2.description: Special programs for students and graduates according to the best curricula and latest technologies.

goal3.title: Dissemination
goal3.description: Knowledge of recitations between the memorizers and facilitating access for the readers.

goal4.title: Care
goal4.description: Instilling the value of commitment and preserving the Holy Qur'an and perfecting its recitation.

AboutMotqen.title: Establishment of the Association
AboutMotqen.subtitle: Establishment of Motqen Association
AboutMotqen.about: Motqen Association is the fruit of the Motqen program, which began its work in 1436 AH. It aims to refine the outcomes of those who wish to master their memorization of the Book of Allah from Quran memorization circles and others. The program has developed over the years to suit all beneficiaries, focusing on work evaluation through periodic and diverse evaluation tools and enabling the staff from program graduates to achieve human sustainability.
AboutMotqen.about2: Based on the pressing need we observed to expand the program's scope, which served 5,000 applicants annually, and due to the evident demand in the Quran memorization sector for such successful individual initiatives, we worked diligently, relying on Allah, to transform the program into an independent association. This association specializes in this field to achieve integration and fill the missing link alongside similar organizations. We ask Allah to make this work sincerely for His sake and a source of light for all who contributed to it.

strongInfo.title: Non-Personal Information:
strongInfo.content: Such as your IP address, browser type, visit date and time, and any other information related to your use of the website.

howWeUseInformation.content: We use the information we collect to enhance your experience with the 'Motqen Association' website, including:

Responding to your inquiries and feedback.
Improving and developing the website and the services offered through it.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: The 'Motqen Association' website may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small files stored on your computer to track your preferences and activities on the website.

informationDisclosure.title: Information Disclosure
informationDisclosure.content: We will not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties except in the following cases:
items: If disclosure is necessary to enforce the terms of use or protect the rights of the association or other users.

userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal information at any time by contacting us through the available channels.

strongInfo.content: You must use the website for lawful purposes and in accordance with the specified terms. You may not use the website in any way that could cause harm to the website or violate the rights of others.
